steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Text' section, click on 'Object' and select 'Text from File'.
Browse and select the file containing the invoice template.
Replace the placeholder text in the invoice template with the appropriate details (e.g., customer name, invoice number, items, quantities, prices, etc.).
Save the document with a suitable name and location.
Review the invoice for accuracy and make any necessary adjustments.
Print or export the invoice as needed.
